<DESCRIPTION>FORM OF NON-QUALIFIED STOCK OPTION AGREEMENT
<TEXT>
<HTML><HEAD>
<TITLE>Form of Non-Qualified Stock Option Agreement</TITLE>
</HEAD>
 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Exhibit 10.36 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>FORM OF </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>NON-QUALIFIED STOCK OPTION AGREEMENT </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>GRANTED PURSUANT TO THE 2003 STOCK AND INCENTIVE PLAN </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">THIS AGREEMENT, entered into as of the Date of Grant (as defined herein), by and between <B>____________</B> (the &#147;<U>Participant</U>&#148;) and Matador Resources Company (the
&#147;<U>Company</U>&#148;). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>RECITALS </U></B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the Company has instituted the Matador Resources Company 2003 Stock and Incentive Plan (the &#147;<U>Plan</U>&#148;), which is incorporated by reference into and forms a part of this Agreement,
and the Participant has been selected by the board of directors or committee (collectively, the &#147;<U>Committee</U>&#148;) administering the Plan to receive a Non-Qualified Stock Option Award under the Plan. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">NOW THEREFORE, IT IS AGREED, by and between the Company and the Participant as follows: </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">1.</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Definitions</U></B>. Terms otherwise not defined herein shall have the meaning ascribed to them in the Plan. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">2.</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Terms of Award</U></B>. In consideration for the Participant&#146;s service to the Company and to provide incentive to the Participant to continue service to the
Company, a Non-Qualified Stock Option (the &#147;<U>Option</U>&#148;) is hereby granted to the Participant on the following terms: </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="9%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Number of Shares</U>. </B>The number of shares subject to the Option is _________ shares of common stock, par value $0.01 per share (&#147;<U>Shares</U>&#148;).
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="9%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Exercise Price</U></B>. The &#147;Exercise Price&#148; is $_____ for each Share. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="9%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(c)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Date of Grant</U></B>. This Option is granted as of __________ (the &#147;<U>Date of Grant</U>&#148;). </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="9%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(d)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Non-Incentive Stock Options</U></B>. The Option is not intended to constitute an &#147;incentive stock option&#148; as that term is used in Code section&nbsp;422.
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="9%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(e)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Exercisability</U></B>. The Option shall be exercisable as follows: </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:9%; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">________ Shares as of the Date of Grant. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="9%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(f)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Other Terms</U></B>. The Option shall, in all respects, be subject to the terms, definitions and provisions of the Plan. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">3. <B><U>Expiration</U></B>. The Option shall not be exercisable after the Company&#146;s
close of business on the last business day that occurs prior to the Expiration Date. The &#147;<U>Expiration Date</U>&#148; shall be earliest to occur of: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a) the ___-year anniversary of the Date of Grant; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) if the
Participant&#146;s Date of Termination occurs by reason of death or Disability, the one-year anniversary of such Date of Termination; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(c) if the Participant&#146;s Date of Termination occurs by reason, in whole or in material part, for Cause, on such Date of Termination; or </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(d) if the Participant&#146;s Date of Termination occurs for reasons other than death, Disability or Cause, 30 days after
such Date of Termination. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">4. <B><U>Method of Exercise</U></B>. This Option shall be exercisable by a written notice delivered
to the Company that shall: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a) state the election to exercise the Option and the number of Shares in respect
of which it is being exercised; and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) be signed by the person or persons entitled to exercise the Option
and, if the Option is being exercised by any person or persons other than the Participant, be accompanied by proof, satisfactory to the Company, of the right of such person or persons to exercise the Option. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">5. <B><U>Payment</U></B>. The Exercise Price of any Shares purchased shall be paid in any manner permitted by the Plan. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">6. <B><U>Withholding</U></B>. The Participant shall make satisfactory arrangements for the withholding of any amounts necessary for
withholding in accordance with applicable federal or state income tax laws. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">7. <B><U>Issuance of Shares</U></B>. No person
shall be, or have any of the rights or privileges of, a shareholder of the Company with respect to any of the Shares subject to an Option unless and until certificates representing such Shares shall have been issued and delivered to such person. As
a condition of any issuance of a certificate for Shares, the Committee may obtain such agreements or undertakings, if any, as it may deem necessary or advisable to assure compliance with any provision of the Plan, the Option Agreement or any law or
regulation including, but not limited to, the following: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a) A representation, warranty or agreement by the
Participant to the Company at the time any Option is exercised that he or she is acquiring the Shares to be issued to him or her for investment and not with a view to, or for sale in connection with, the distribution of any such Shares; and
</FONT></P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">2 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) A representation, warranty or agreement to be bound by any legends that
are, in the opinion of the Committee, necessary or appropriate to comply with the provisions of any securities laws deemed by the Committee to be applicable to the issuance of the Shares and are endorsed upon the Share certificates. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">8. <B><U>Surrender of Option</U></B>. Upon exercise of this Option in part, if requested by the Company, the Participant shall deliver
this Option and any other written agreements executed by the Company and the Participant with respect to this Option to the Company, which shall endorse or cause to be endorsed thereon a notation of such exercise and return all such agreements to
the Participant. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">9. <B><U>Transferability of Option</U></B>. The Option is not transferable, other than as designated by the
Participant by will or by the laws of descent and distribution, and during the Participant&#146;s life, may be exercised only by the Participant. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">10. <B><U>Administration</U></B>. The Plan and this Option shall be administered by the Committee as provided for and described in the Plan. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><DIV ALIGN="right">
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="40%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE">


<TR>

<TR>

 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">3 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Participant acknowledges receipt of a copy of the Plan, and represents that the
Participant is familiar with the terms and provisions thereof, and hereby accepts this Option subject to all the terms and provisions of the Plan. The Participant hereby agrees to accept as binding, conclusive and final all decisions or
interpretations of the Committee (as defined in the Plan) upon any questions arising under the Plan. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><DIV ALIGN="right">
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="40%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE">

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-10.37
<SEQUENCE>3
<FILENAME>d325766dex1037.htm
<DESCRIPTION>FORM OF INCENTIVE STOCK OPTION AGREEMENT
<TEXT>
<HTML><HEAD>
<TITLE>Form of Incentive Stock Option Agreement</TITLE>
</HEAD>
 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Exhibit 10.37 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>FORM OF </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>INCENTIVE STOCK OPTION AGREEMENT </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>GRANTED PURSUANT TO THE 2003 STOCK AND INCENTIVE PLAN </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">THIS AGREEMENT, entered into as of the Date of Grant (as defined herein), by and between
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (the &#147;<U>Participant</U>&#148;) and Matador Resources Company (the &#147;<U>Company</U>&#148;). </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>RECITALS </U></B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the Company has instituted the Matador Resources Company 2003 Stock and Incentive Plan (the &#147;<U>Plan</U>&#148;), which is incorporated by reference into and forms a part of this Agreement,
and the Participant, who is an employee of the Company or one of its Subsidiaries, has been selected by the board of directors or committee (collectively, the &#147;<U>Committee</U>&#148;) administering the Plan to receive an Incentive Stock Option
Award under the Plan. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">NOW THEREFORE, IT IS AGREED, by and between the Company and the Participant as follows: </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B><U>Definitions</U></B>. Terms otherwise not defined herein shall have the meaning ascribed to
them in the Plan. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B><U>Terms of Award</U></B>. In consideration for the
Participant&#146;s service to the Company and to provide incentive to the Participant to continue service to the Company, an Incentive Stock Option (the &#147;<U>Option</U>&#148;) is hereby granted to the Participant on the following terms:
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a) <B><U>Number of Shares</U>. </B>The number of shares subject to the Option is
<U>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</U> shares of common stock, par value $0.01 per share (&#147;<U>Shares</U>&#148;). </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) <B><U>Exercise Price</U></B>. The &#147;Exercise Price&#148; is
$<U>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</U> for each Share. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(c)
<B><U>Date of Grant</U></B>. This Option is granted as of <U>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</U> (the &#147;<U>Date of Grant</U>&#148;). </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(d) <B><U>Incentive Stock Options</U></B>. The Option is intended to constitute an &#147;incentive stock option&#148; as
that term is used in Code section&nbsp;422. The limitations imposed on Incentive Stock Options by the Plan shall be applicable to this Option. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(e) <B><U>Exercisability</U></B>. The Option shall be exercisable as follows: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:7%; text-indent:4%"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</U> Shares after the first anniversary of the Date of Grant; </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:7%; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</U> Shares after the second anniversary of the
Date of Grant; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:7%; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</U> Shares after
the third anniversary of the Date of Grant; and </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:7%; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</U> Shares after the fourth anniversary of the
Date of Grant. </FONT></P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(f) <B><U>Other Terms</U></B>. The Option shall, in all respects, be subject
to the terms, definitions and provisions of the Plan. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B><U>Expiration</U></B>. The
Option shall not be exercisable after the Company&#146;s close of business on the last business day that occurs prior to the Expiration Date. The &#147;<U>Expiration Date</U>&#148; shall be earliest to occur of: </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a) the <U>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</U>-year anniversary of the Date of Grant; </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) if the Participant&#146;s Date of Termination occurs by reason of Disability, the one-year anniversary of such Date of
Termination; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(c) if the Participant&#146;s Date of Termination occurs by reason of death, subsection
(a)&nbsp;above applies; or </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(d) if the Participant&#146;s Date of Termination occurs for reasons other than
death or Disability, including for Cause, 30 days after such Date of Termination. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B><U>Method of Exercise</U></B>. This Option shall be exercisable by a written notice delivered to
the Company that shall: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a) state the election to exercise the Option and the number of Shares in respect of
which it is being exercised; and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) be signed by the person or persons entitled to exercise the Option and,
if the Option is being exercised by any person or persons other than the Participant, be accompanied by proof, satisfactory to the Company, of the right of such person or persons to exercise the Option. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B><U>Payment</U></B>. The Exercise Price of any Shares purchased shall be paid in any manner
permitted by the Plan. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">6.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B><U>Withholding</U></B>. The Participant shall make
satisfactory arrangements for the withholding of any amounts necessary for withholding in accordance with applicable federal or state income tax laws. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">7.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B><U>Issuance of Shares</U></B>. No person shall be, or have any of the rights or privileges of, a shareholder of the Company with respect to any of the Shares
subject to an Option unless and until certificates representing such Shares shall have been issued and delivered to such person. As a condition of any issuance of a certificate for Shares, the Committee may obtain such agreements or undertakings, if
any, as it may deem necessary or advisable to assure compliance with any provision of the Plan, the Option Agreement or any law or regulation including, but not limited to, the following: </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a) A representation, warranty or agreement by the Participant to the Company at the time any Option is exercised that he
or she is acquiring the Shares to be issued to him or her for investment and not with a view to, or for sale in connection with, the distribution of any such Shares; and </FONT></P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) A representation, warranty or agreement to be bound by any legends that
are, in the opinion of the Committee, necessary or appropriate to comply with the provisions of any securities laws deemed by the Committee to be applicable to the issuance of the Shares and are endorsed upon the Share certificates. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">8.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B><U>Surrender of Option</U></B>. Upon exercise of this Option in part, if requested by the
Company, the Participant shall deliver this Option and any other written agreements executed by the Company and the Participant with respect to this Option to the Company, which shall endorse or cause to be endorsed thereon a notation of such
exercise and return all such agreements to the Participant. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">9.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B><U>Transferability of
Option</U></B>. The Option is not transferable, other than as designated by the Participant by will or by the laws of descent and distribution, and during the Participant&#146;s life, may be exercised only by the Participant. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">10.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B><U>Company Reservation</U></B>. After the Date of Termination of the Participant for whatever
reason, including for Cause, the Company shall have the right, but not the obligation, to repurchase from the Participant (or his or her heirs, devisees or personal representatives) all or any part of the Shares that have been previously purchased,
or are thereafter purchased, by the Participant (or his or her heirs, devisees or personal representatives) upon any exercise of this Option. Such right may be exercised by the Company (i)&nbsp;as to any Shares purchased prior to the Date of
Termination, at any time within 60 days after the Date of Termination or (ii)&nbsp;as to any Shares purchased after the Date of Termination, at any time within 30 days after such purchase. The repurchase price per Share payable by the Company will
equal the Share&#146;s Fair Market Value on the Date of Termination. Subject to effecting satisfactory tax withholding arrangements, if agreed between the Participant (or the person or persons exercising this Option) and the Company, the Exercise
Price for any Shares being purchased from the Company after the Date of Termination may be netted against the purchase price payable by the Company. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">11.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B><U>Administration</U></B>. The Plan and this Option shall be administered by the Committee as provided for and described in the Plan. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:54%; text-indent:-2%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">MATADOR RESOURCES COMPANY </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:54%; text-indent:-2%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">_______________________________ </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:54%; text-indent:-2%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Joseph Wm. Foran </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:54%; text-indent:-2%"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Chairman and CEO </FONT></P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Participant acknowledges receipt of a copy of the Plan, and represents that the
Participant is familiar with the terms and provisions thereof, and hereby accepts this Option subject to all the terms and provisions of the Plan. The Participant hereby agrees to accept as binding, conclusive and final all decisions or
interpretations of the Committee (as defined in the Plan) upon any questions arising under the Plan. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:54%; text-indent:-2%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">_______________________________________ </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:54%; text-indent:-2%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Participant: </FONT></P>
</BODY></HTML>
</TEXT>
</DOCUMENT>
<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-10.38
<SEQUENCE>4
<FILENAME>d325766dex1038.htm
<DESCRIPTION>FORM OF NONQUALIFIED STOCK OPTION AGREEMENT
<TEXT>
<HTML><HEAD>
<TITLE>Form of Nonqualified Stock Option Agreement</TITLE>
</HEAD>
 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Exhibit 10.38 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>FORM OF </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>NONQUALIFIED STOCK OPTION AGREEMENT </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>MATADOR RESOURCES COMPANY </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>2012 LONG-TERM INCENTIVE PLAN </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">1. <U>Grant of Option</U>. Pursuant to the
Matador Resources Company 2012 Long-Term Incentive Plan (the &#147;<B><I>Plan</I></B>&#148;) for Employees, Contractors, and Outside Directors of Matador Resources Company, a Texas corporation (the &#147;<B><I>Company</I></B>&#148;), the Company
grants to </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><center> <P STYLE="line-height:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:2px;border-bottom:0.5pt solid #000000;width:39%">&nbsp;</P></center>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(the &#147;<B><I>Participant</I></B>&#148;), </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">an option (the &#147;<B><I>Option</I></B>&#148; or &#147;<B><I>Stock Option</I></B>&#148;) to purchase a total of
<U>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</U>
full shares of common stock, par value $0.01 per share (the &#147;<B><I>Common Stock</I></B>&#148;), of the Company (the &#147;<B><I>Optioned Shares</I></B>&#148;) at an &#147;<B><I>Option Price</I></B>&#148; equal to
$<U>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</U> per share (being the Fair Market Value per share of the Common Stock on the Date of Grant). </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The &#147;<B><I>Date of Grant</I></B>&#148; of this Stock Option is
<U>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</U>. The &#147;<B><I>Option Period</I></B>&#148; shall commence on the Date of Grant and shall expire on the date immediately
preceding the <U>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</U> anniversary of the Date of Grant, unless terminated earlier in accordance with <U>Section&nbsp;4</U> below.
The Stock Option is a Nonqualified Stock Option. This Stock Option is intended to comply with the provisions governing nonqualified stock options under the final Treasury Regulations issued on April&nbsp;17, 2007, in order to exempt this Stock
Option from application of Section&nbsp;409A of the Code. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">2. <U>Subject to Plan</U>. The Stock Option and its exercise are
subject to the terms and conditions of the Plan, and the terms of the Plan shall control to the extent not otherwise inconsistent with the provisions of this Nonqualified Stock Option Agreement (the &#147;<B><I>Agreement</I></B>&#148;). The
capitalized terms used herein that are defined in the Plan shall have the same meanings assigned to them in the Plan. The Stock Option is subject to any rules promulgated pursuant to the Plan by the Board of Directors (the
&#147;<B><I>Board</I></B>&#148;) or the committee appointed by the Board to administer the Plan (the &#147;<B><I>Committee</I></B>&#148;) and communicated to the Participant in writing. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">3. <U>Vesting; Time of Exercise</U>. Except as specifically provided in this Agreement and subject to certain restrictions and conditions
set forth in the Plan, the Optioned Shares shall be vested and the Stock Option shall be exercisable as follows: </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">a.
<U>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</U> of the total Optioned
Shares shall vest and that portion of the Stock Option shall be exercisable on the <U>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</U> anniversary of the Date of Grant,
provided the Participant is employed by (or, if the Participant is a Contractor or an Outside Director, is providing services to) the Company or a Subsidiary on that date. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">b.
<U>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</U>
of the total Optioned Shares shall vest and that portion of the Stock Option shall become exercisable on the <U>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</U> anniversary
of the Date of Grant, provided the Participant is employed by (or, if the Participant is a Contractor or an Outside Director, is providing services to) the Company or a Subsidiary on that date. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">c.
<U>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</U>
of the total Optioned Shares shall vest and that portion of the Stock Option shall become exercisable on the <U>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</U> anniversary
of the Date of </FONT></P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
Grant, provided the Participant is employed by (or, if the Participant is a Contractor or an Outside Director, is providing services to) the Company or a Subsidiary on that date. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">[In the event that a &#147;<B><I>Change in Control</I></B>&#148; (as such term is defined in that certain Employment Agreement, effective
as of <U>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</U>, by and between the
Company and the Participant (the &#147;<B><I>Employment Agreement</I></B>&#148;)) occurs, then immediately prior to the effective date of such Change in Control, the total Optioned Shares not previously vested shall thereupon immediately become
vested and this Stock Option shall become fully exercisable, if not previously so exercisable.] </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">4. <U>Term; Forfeiture</U>.
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">a. Except as otherwise provided in this Agreement, to the extent the unexercised portion of the Stock Option
relates to Optioned Shares which are not vested on the date of the Participant&#146;s Termination (as such term is set forth in the Employment Agreement), the Stock Option will be terminated on that date. The unexercised portion of the Stock Option
that relates to Optioned Shares which are vested will terminate at the first of the following to occur: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:9%; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">i. 5
p.m. on the date the Option Period terminates; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:9%; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">ii. 5 p.m. on the date which is twelve (12)&nbsp;months
following the date of the Participant&#146;s Termination due to Partial or Total Disability (as such terms are set forth in the Employment Agreement); </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:9%; text-indent:4%"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">iii. immediately upon the Participant&#146;s Termination by the Company for Just Cause (as defined herein); </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:9%; text-indent:4%"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">iv. 5 p.m. on the date which is thirty (30)&nbsp;days following the date of the Participant&#146;s Termination for any reason not otherwise specified in this Section&nbsp;4.a. (other than due to the
Participant&#146;s death, in which case, Section&nbsp;4.a.i. applies); </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:9%; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">v. 5 p.m. on the date the Company
causes any portion of the Stock Option to be forfeited pursuant to Section&nbsp;7 hereof. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">b. For purposes
hereof, &#147;<B><I>Just Cause</I></B>&#148; shall mean (i)&nbsp;the Participant&#146;s continued and material failure to perform the duties of his employment consistent with the Participant&#146;s position, except as a result of being Partially
Disabled (during any period of Partial Disability) or Totally Disabled, (ii)&nbsp;the Participant&#146;s failure to perform his material obligations under his employment agreement, if any, except as a result of being Partially Disabled (during any
period of Partial Disability) or Totally Disabled, or a material breach by the Participant of the Company&#146;s written policies concerning discrimination, harassment or securities trading, (iii)&nbsp;the Participant&#146;s refusal or failure to
follow lawful directives of the Board and his supervisor, except as a result of being Partially Disabled (during any period of Partial Disability) or Totally Disabled, (iv)&nbsp;the Participant&#146;s commission of an act of fraud, theft, or
embezzlement, (v)&nbsp;the Participant&#146;s indictment for or conviction of a felony or other crime involving moral turpitude, or (vi)&nbsp;the Participant&#146;s intentional breach of fiduciary duty; provided, however, that the Participant shall
have thirty (30)&nbsp;days after written notice from the Board (or the Committee) to remedy any actions alleged under subsections (i), (ii)&nbsp;or (iii)&nbsp;in the manner reasonably specified by the Board (or the Committee). </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">5. <U>Who May Exercise</U>. Subject to the terms and conditions set forth in <U>Sections 3 and 4</U> above, during the lifetime of the
Participant, the Stock Option may be exercised only by the Participant, </FONT></P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">- 2 -
</FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
or by the Participant&#146;s guardian or personal or legal representative. If the Participant&#146;s Termination is due to his death prior to the dates specified in <U>Section&nbsp;4.a.</U>
hereof, and the Participant has not exercised the Stock Option as to the maximum number of vested Optioned Shares as set forth in <U>Section&nbsp;3</U> hereof as of the date of death, the following persons may exercise the exercisable portion of the
Stock Option on behalf of the Participant at any time prior to the date specified in <U>Section&nbsp;4.a.i.</U> hereof: the personal representative of his estate, or the person who acquired the right to exercise the Stock Option by bequest or
inheritance or by reason of the death of the Participant; provided that the Stock Option shall remain subject to the other terms of this Agreement, the Plan, and Applicable Laws, rules, and regulations. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">6. <U>No Fractional Shares</U>. The Stock Option may be exercised only with respect to full shares, and no fractional share of stock
shall be issued. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">7. <U>Manner of Exercise</U>. Subject to such administrative regulations as the Committee may from time to
time adopt, the Stock Option may be exercised by the delivery of written notice to the Committee setting forth the number of shares of Common Stock with respect to which the Stock Option is to be exercised, the date of exercise thereof (the
&#147;<B><I>Exercise Date</I></B>&#148;) which shall be at least three (3)&nbsp;days after giving such notice unless an earlier time shall have been mutually agreed upon. On the Exercise Date, the Participant shall deliver to the Company
consideration with a value equal to the total Option Price of the shares to be purchased, payable in any manner permitted by the Plan. In the event that shares of Restricted Stock are tendered as consideration for the exercise of a Stock Option, a
number of shares of Common Stock issued upon the exercise of the Stock Option equal to the number of shares of Restricted Stock used as consideration therefor shall be subject to the same restrictions and provisions as the Restricted Stock so
tendered. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Upon payment of all amounts due from the Participant, the Company shall cause the Common Stock then being purchased
to be registered in the Participant&#146;s name (or the person exercising the Participant&#146;s Stock Option in the event of his death) promptly after the Exercise Date. The obligation of the Company to register shares of Common Stock shall,
however, be subject to the condition that, if at any time the Company shall determine in its discretion that the listing, registration, or qualification of the Stock Option or the Common Stock upon any securities exchange or inter-dealer quotation
system or under any state or federal law, or the consent or approval of any governmental regulatory body, is necessary as a condition of, or in connection with, the Stock Option or the issuance or purchase of shares of Common Stock thereunder, then
the Stock Option may not be exercised in whole or in part unless such listing, registration, qualification, consent, or approval shall have been effected or obtained free of any conditions not reasonably acceptable to the Committee. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">If the Participant fails to pay for any of the Optioned Shares specified in such notice or fails to accept delivery thereof, that portion
of the Participant&#146;s Stock Option and right to purchase such Optioned Shares may be forfeited by the Participant. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">8.
<U>Nonassignability</U>. The Stock Option is not assignable or transferable by the Participant except by will or by the laws of descent and distribution. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">9. <U>Rights as Shareholder</U>. The Participant will have no rights as a shareholder with respect to any of the Optioned Shares until the issuance of a certificate or certificates to the Participant or
the registration of such shares in the Participant&#146;s name for the shares of Common Stock. The Optioned Shares shall be subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement. Except as otherwise provided in <U>Section&nbsp;10</U> hereof, no
adjustment shall be made for dividends or other rights for which the record date is prior to the issuance of such certificate or certificates. The Participant, by his or her execution of this Agreement, agrees to execute any documents requested by
the Company in connection with the issuance of the shares of Common Stock. </FONT></P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">- 3 -
</FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">10. <U>Adjustment of Number of Optioned Shares and Related Matters</U>. The number of shares
of Common Stock covered by the Stock Option, and the Option Prices thereof, shall be subject to adjustment in accordance with <U>Articles 11&#151;13</U> of the Plan. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">11. <U>Nonqualified Stock Option</U>. The Stock Option shall not be treated as an Incentive Stock Option. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">12. <U>Voting</U>. The Participant, as record holder of some or all of the Optioned Shares following exercise of this Stock Option, has the exclusive right to vote, or consent with respect to, such
Optioned Shares until such time as the Optioned Shares are transferred in accordance with this Agreement; <U>provided</U>, <U>however</U>, that this Section shall not create any voting right where the holders of such Optioned Shares otherwise have
no such right. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">13. <U>Specific Performance</U>. The parties acknowledge that remedies at law will be inadequate remedies for
breach of this Agreement and consequently agree that this Agreement shall be enforceable by specific performance. The remedy of specific performance shall be cumulative of all of the rights and remedies at law or in equity of the parties under this
Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">14. <U>Participant&#146;s Representations</U>. Notwithstanding any of the provisions hereof, the Participant
hereby agrees that he will not exercise the Stock Option granted hereby, and that the Company will not be obligated to issue any shares to the Participant hereunder, if the exercise thereof or the issuance of such shares shall constitute a violation
by the Participant or the Company of any provision of any law or regulation of any governmental authority. Any determination in this connection by the Company shall be final, binding, and conclusive. The obligations of the Company and the rights of
the Participant are subject to all Applicable Laws, rules, and regulations. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">15. <U>Investment Representation</U>. Unless the
shares of Common Stock are issued to the Participant in a transaction registered under applicable federal and state securities laws, by his execution hereof, the Participant represents and warrants to the Company that all Common Stock which may be
purchased hereunder will be acquired by the Participant for investment purposes for his own account and not with any intent for resale or distribution in violation of federal or state securities laws. Unless the Common Stock is issued to him in a
transaction registered under the applicable federal and state securities laws, all certificates issued with respect to the Common Stock shall bear an appropriate restrictive investment legend and shall be held indefinitely, unless they are
subsequently registered under the applicable federal and state securities laws or the Participant obtains an opinion of counsel, in form and substance satisfactory to the Company and its counsel, that such registration is not required. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">16. <U>Participant&#146;s Acknowledgments</U>. The Participant acknowledges that a copy of the Plan has been made available for his or
her review by the Company, and represents that he or she is familiar with the terms and provisions thereof, and hereby accepts this Stock Option subject to all the terms and provisions thereof. The Participant hereby agrees to accept as binding,
conclusive, and final all decisions or interpretations of the Committee or the Board, as appropriate, upon any questions arising under the Plan or this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">17. <U>Law Governing</U>. This Agreement shall be governed by, construed, and enforced in accordance with the laws of the State of Texas (excluding any conflict of laws rule or principle of Texas law that
might refer the governance, construction, or interpretation of this Agreement to the laws of another state). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">18. <U>No Right
to Continue Service or Employment</U>. Nothing herein shall be construed to confer upon the Participant the right to continue in the employ or to provide services to the Company or </FONT></P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">- 4 -
</FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
any Subsidiary, whether as an Employee, a Contractor or an Outside Director, or interfere with or restrict in any way the right of the Company or any Subsidiary to discharge the Participant as an
Employee, Contractor or Outside Director at any time. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">19. <U>Legal Construction.</U> In the event that any one or more of the
terms, provisions, or agreements that are contained in this Agreement shall be held by a court of competent jurisdiction to be invalid, illegal, or unenforceable in any respect for any reason, the invalid, illegal, or unenforceable term, provision,
or agreement shall not affect any other term, provision, or agreement that is contained in this Agreement and this Agreement shall be construed in all respects as if the invalid, illegal, or unenforceable term, provision, or agreement had never been
contained herein. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">20. <U>Covenants and Agreements as Independent Agreements</U>. Each of the covenants and agreements that is
set forth in this Agreement shall be construed as a covenant and agreement independent of any other provision of this Agreement. The existence of any claim or cause of action of the Participant against the Company, whether predicated on this
Agreement or otherwise, shall not constitute a defense to the enforcement by the Company of the covenants and agreements that are set forth in this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">21. <U>Entire Agreement</U>. This Agreement together with the Plan supersede any and all other prior understandings and agreements, either oral or in writing, between the parties with respect to the
subject matter hereof and constitute the sole and only agreements between the parties with respect to the said subject matter. All prior negotiations and agreements between the parties with respect to the subject matter hereof are merged into this
Agreement. Each party to this Agreement acknowledges that no representations, inducements, promises, or agreements, orally or otherwise, have been made by any party or by anyone acting on behalf of any party, which are not embodied in this Agreement
or the Plan and that any agreement, statement or promise that is not contained in this Agreement or the Plan shall not be valid or binding or of any force or effect. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">22. <U>Parties Bound</U>. The terms, provisions, and agreements that are contained in this Agreement shall apply to, be binding upon, and inure to the benefit of the parties and their respective heirs,
executors, administrators, legal representatives, and permitted successors and assigns, subject to the limitation on assignment expressly set forth herein. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">23. <U>Modification</U>. No change or modification of this Agreement shall be valid or binding upon the parties unless the change or modification is in writing and signed by the parties; provided,
however, that the Company may change or modify this Agreement without the Participant&#146;s consent or signature if the Company determines, in its sole discretion, that such change or modification is necessary for purposes of compliance with or
exemption from the requirements of Section&nbsp;409A of the Code or any regulations or other guidance issued thereunder. Notwithstanding the preceding sentence, the Company may amend the Plan to the extent permitted by the Plan. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">24. <U>Headings</U>. The headings that are used in this Agreement are used for reference and convenience purposes only and do not
constitute substantive matters to be considered in construing the terms and provisions of this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">25. <U>Gender and
Number</U>. Words of any gender used in this Agreement shall be held and construed to include any other gender, and words in the singular number shall be held to include the plural, and vice versa, unless the context requires otherwise. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">26. <U>Notice</U>. Any notice required or permitted to be delivered hereunder shall be deemed to be delivered only when actually received
by the Company or by the Participant, as the case may be, at the </FONT></P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">- 5 -
</FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
addresses set forth below, or at such other addresses as they have theretofore specified by written notice delivered in accordance herewith: </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>

STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">5400 LBJ Fwy, Suite 1500 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:13%; text-indent:5%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Dallas, TX 75240 </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:13%; text-indent:5%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Attn: General Counsel </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:13%; text-indent:5%"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Facsimile: (972)&nbsp;371-5201 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">b.</FONT></TD>

<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">27. <U>Tax Requirements</U>. The Participant is hereby advised to consult immediately with his or her own tax advisor regarding the tax
consequences of this Agreement. The Company or, if applicable, any Subsidiary (for purposes of this <U>Section&nbsp;27</U>, the term &#147;<B><I>Company</I></B>&#148; shall be deemed to include any applicable Subsidiary), shall have the right to
deduct from all amounts paid in cash or other form in connection with the Plan, any Federal, state, local, or other taxes required by law to be withheld in connection with this Award. The Company may, in its sole discretion, also require the
Participant receiving shares of Common Stock issued under the Plan to pay the Company the amount of any taxes that the Company is required to withhold in connection with the Participant&#146;s income arising with respect to this Award. Such payments
shall be required to be made when requested by the Company and may be required to be made prior to the delivery of any certificate representing shares of Common Stock. Such payment may be made (i)&nbsp;by the delivery of cash to the Company in an
amount that equals or exceeds (to avoid the issuance of fractional shares under (iii)&nbsp;below) the required tax withholding obligations of the Company; (ii)&nbsp;if the Company, in its sole discretion, so consents in writing, the actual delivery
by the exercising Participant to the Company of shares of Common Stock that the Participant has not acquired from the Company within six (6)&nbsp;months prior to the date of exercise, which shares so delivered have an aggregate Fair Market Value
that equals or exceeds (to avoid the issuance of fractional shares under (iii)&nbsp;below) the required tax withholding payment; (iii)&nbsp;if the Company, in its sole discretion, so consents in writing, the Company&#146;s withholding of a number of
shares to be delivered upon the exercise of the Stock Option, which shares so withheld have an aggregate Fair Market Value that equals (but does not exceed) the required tax withholding payment; or (iv)&nbsp;any combination of (i), (ii), or (iii).
The Company may, in its sole discretion, withhold any such taxes from any other cash remuneration otherwise paid by the Company to the Participant. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* * * * * * * * </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I></I>[<I>Remainder of Page Intentionally Left Blank

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the Company has caused this Agreement to be executed by its duly
authorized officer, and the Participant, to evidence his consent and approval of all the terms hereof, has duly executed this Agreement, as of the date specified in <U>Section&nbsp;1</U> hereof. </FONT></P>
